settings.content_review_cart:
"I ordered the Paper Heart Box with 17 preserved head for mother's day, and the presentation exceeded my expectations. The roses are beautifully printed, and you can write a personal message on them. It´s spectacular, people do not expect this surprise.
My mom was absolutely thrilled!"

"What a wonderful find! The Acrylic Square Box was the perfect birthday gift to my best friend. The attention to details on this product is impeccable. She was so excited that she bought two for her sisters. I highly recommend Speaking Roses for a thoughtful and unique present."
